experience.description: Assisted in the development of statistical models for economic forecasting. Performed data cleansing and regression analysis using R and Excel for academic publications.
Supported the risk assessment team by monitoring portfolio volatility and preparing weekly exposure reports. Analyzed historical market data to identify potential financial risks.
Provided instruction in advanced calculus, probability, and statistics to undergraduate students, ensuring mastery of core mathematical principles required for actuarial science.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience in job field
